name: Analyze 10 Major SaaS Platforms Using Cloudflare
description: A curated collection of real-world Cloudflare implementation case studies from top SaaS companies including Discord, Shopify, GitHub, and Slack. Evaluates edge computing, collaboration, and delivery metrics.

itemListElement.name: Discord
itemListElement.description: Hybrid architecture using Cloudflare for CDN, DDoS, and API protection for world-class real-time scaling.

itemListElement.name: Shopify
itemListElement.description: Powering millions of storefronts with 70-80% edge delivery using Workers and KV for global e-commerce performance.

itemListElement.name: GitHub
itemListElement.description: Utilizing Cloudflare for 95% edge delivery of static assets and robust DDoS protection for the global developer ecosystem.

itemListElement.name: Slack
itemListElement.description: Enterprise-grade team collaboration secured and accelerated via Cloudflare's WAF and global network.

itemListElement.name: Zoom
itemListElement.description: Hybrid delivery model leveraging Cloudflare for web asset delivery and signaling to ensure global meeting reliability.

itemListElement.name: Notion
itemListElement.description: 100% edge-delivered workspace platform using Workers for collaborative state and real-time synchronization.

itemListElement.name: Figma
itemListElement.description: Design collaboration tool utilizing Cloudflare for static asset delivery and API acceleration.

itemListElement.name: Stripe
itemListElement.description: Payments infrastructure using Cloudflare for secure checkout pages and global API latency reduction.

itemListElement.name: Canva
itemListElement.description: Visual design platform leveraging Cloudflare Workers for edge image processing and global asset delivery.

itemListElement.name: Reddit
itemListElement.description: Scaling community interactions and content delivery globally with Cloudflare's CDN and Bot Management functionality.
